title: Champion select Screen is Black
body: when i select a match for the game the screen just  turns black and it doesn't show the champions please help

replies.body: The black screen usually indicates a poor connection that's failing to maintain communication with the server, so it can't download any assets.  Your best bet is to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your network.  Let me know if you have any questions!
